title: For the last few days I am receiving OTPs delayed for hours in Pixel 4 XL
content:
For the last few days I am getting the OTPs hours late. 
It is not the vodafone network issue as I tried my sim in a 1+ phone and got OTP instantly.
It is not bank issue as  I tried my sim in a 1+ phone and got OTP instantly.
I tried with multiple credit card OTPs in oneplus and pixel 4 XL. Pixel 4 XL fails to get OTP on time. How can I fix this issue ?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
